articles.description: NHS England has invited people aged 56 to 59 to book COVID-19 vaccinations in the coming week, with letters to 850,000 people in that age bracket landing on doorsteps from Saturday and another 850,000 due to land Monday.
articles.content:

articles.title: More than 1 million first doses of COVID-19 vaccine coming to Texas this week - KSAT San Antonio

articles.title: State's seven-day COVID-19 death average falls below 10, nearly 600000 complete vaccine series - WBAY
articles.description: Wisconsin’s seven-day death average from COVID-19 is now the lowest it has been since last fall.
articles.content: MADISON, Wis. (WBAY) Wisconsins seven-day death average from COVID-19 is now the lowest it has been since last fall. As of Saturday, the seven-day death average fell to nine, the first time it has be… [+13036 chars]
